type: Business focus. Minor in Economics. Co-op
bulletpoints: Awards: Sher Ali Mirza Award 2022 (1,780 CAD), Ontario Remembrance Award 2024 (10,000 CAD)
Best Graduate and Best State Exam of the class of 2020-2021.
Multiple Academic Awards in areas such as Math, English and Computer Science during 8 years of tenure.
Engineered internal tools written in Python and Google Apps Script to automate the import of information to the database, drastically enhancing productivity.
Conducted several detailed data analyses of yearly performance and presented recommendations to stakeholders for the upcoming cycle.

Developed and tested multiple machine learning models with Scikit-learn and TensorFlow that predict student enrollment with an 80% accuracy given factors like engagement with marketing campaigns, country, level of study, etc.
Supervised and mentored a team member in advanced data cleaning and importing procedures.
